title: Reconnection Issues
body:
Been trying to play for the past 8 hours or so and I am getting nearly every game the attempt to reconnect issue. I have double checked to make sure my network is functional and I have no other issues.

Please Riot, get onto this ASAP!

replies.body: Done all of the above and I am having high packet buffering but its load on my network where i can usually still keep connected. I keep getting "Attempt to Reconnect" throughout an entire game.

>Please Riot, get onto this ASAP!

.

We can only hope.

Have you read [this page](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)?
